verbose_text: Although Lp was detected in both systems investigated, the level of contamination was significantly higher in wing A. Despite the observed reduction in hot water contamination levels after the heat shock disinfection, XREF_BIBR Lp was still detected by culture in more than 45% of faucets and in the recirculation water for both wings in February 2015, 6 months after the implementation of corrective measures.
